text: haey brasenbae puok anak baromph khlach meankar bekbak rveang anak teangpir( bei d braponth) dau che neah chaur puok anak b nhchou n anak samrob saam ruol mnea k pi sachnheate khang brosa ning anakasamrobasamruol mneaktiet pi sachnheate khang srei bae anakasamrobasamruol teangpir noh chng phsaahphsaa a l laoh nung phsaahphsaa rveang bdei braponth ke teangpir . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha doeng mha chruotachreab
